parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Dominion, strength, power; a mighty deed. Perhaps a primary word; vigor.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The arm, strength. Properly, comparative of brachus, but apparently in the sense of brasso; the arm, i.e. strength.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From dia and skorpizo; to dissipate, i.e. to rout or separate; specially, to winnow; figuratively, to squander.
Proud, arrogant, disdainful. From huper and phaino; appearing above others, i.e. haughty.
From dia and nous; deep thought, properly, the faculty, by implication, its exercise.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.
